title: Azure Bloom Jhumka: Neelam and Diamond Cascade
materials: 18 Karat Gold. Features captivating Neelam (Sapphire) gemstones
6.02 carats Blue stones. Features a lustrous Hyderabadi polish for lasting radiance.
features: A modern interpretation of the classic Jhumka, with a floral-inspired design. A cabochon Neelam sits atop a cluster of intricately set diamonds. The lower portion showcases a pear-shaped, bezel-set blue stone surrounded by diamond leaves, reminiscent of traditional South Indian motifs but with a contemporary flair.
colors: with the rich blue of the Neelam and the sparkling white of the diamonds against the warm glow of the 18K gold.
occasions: or festive occasions. Adds a touch of modern elegance to traditional attire
making it suitable for events like weddings
description: Exquisite craftsmanship combines traditional South Indian artistry with modern design sensibilities. The captivating Neelam gemstones and sparkling diamonds create a mesmerizing effect, ensuring you stand out. The earrings are lightweight and comfortable for extended wear, and the high-quality materials ensure durability and lasting beauty.
